blacklisted: You are blacklisted in this group
start:
**Commands:**

 <prefix>start / <prefix>help
**Desc:** `Show the commands`
**e.g.**  `<prefix>help`

 <prefix>play [song name | youtube link]
**Desc:** `Play a song in voice call, if already playing add to queue`
**Note:** `Or you can reply to a message with <prefix>play, it's same`
**e.g.**  `<prefix>play falling`, `<prefix>play https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eIc4mqyN1Q8` 

 <prefix>radio [radio stream url]
**Desc:** `Play a radio stream in voice call, if already playing add to queue`
**e.g.**  `<prefix>radio http://a.files.bbci.co.uk/media/live/manifesto/audio/simulcast/hls/nonuk/sbr_low/ak/bbc_world_service.m3u8` 

 <prefix>skip / <prefix>next
**Desc:** `Skip to next song`
**e.g.**  `<prefix>skip`

 <prefix>leave
**Desc:** `Leave from voice call and clear the queue`
**e.g.**  `<prefix>leave`

 <prefix>queue
**Desc:** `Show songs in the queue`
**e.g.**  `<prefix>queue`

 <prefix>shuffle
**Desc:** `Shuflle the queue`
**e.g.**  `<prefix>shuffle`

 <prefix>now
**Desc:** `Show currently playing song`
**e.g.**  `<prefix>now`

 <prefix>loop
**Desc:** `Switch the loop mode`
**e.g.**  `<prefix>loop`

 <prefix>quiet
**Desc:** `Switch the quiet mode`
**e.g.**  `<prefix>quiet`

 <prefix>language [lang code]
**Desc:** `Set bot language in a group`
**e.g.**  `<prefix>language en`

 <prefix>addbl [user id]
**Desc:** `Add user to blacklist in group`
**Note:** `Or reply the user's message with <prefix>addbl you want to blacklist`
**e.g.**  `<prefix>addbl 111111111`, `<prefix>addbl (with reply)`

 <prefix>rmbl [user id]
**Desc:** `Remove user from blacklist in group`
**Note:** `Or reply the user's message with <prefix>rmbl you want to unblacklist`
**e.g.**  `<prefix>rmbl 111111111`, `<prefix>rmbl (with reply)`

 <prefix>getbl
**Desc:** `Get blacklisted user's ids in group`
**e.g.**  `<prefix>getbl`

 <prefix>export
**Desc:** `Export the queue for import in future (like playlist)`
**Note:** `Save the exported file`
**e.g.**  `<prefix>export`

 <prefix>import
**Desc:** `Import queue from exported file`
**Note:** `Reply the exported file with <prefix>import`
**e.g.**  `<prefix>import (with reply)`

 <prefix>playlist [playlist url]
**Desc:** `Import playlist from youtube/spotify`
**Note:** `This command has some bugs`
**e.g.**  `<prefix>playlist https://open.spotify.com/playlist/3ZgmfR6lsnCwdffZUan8EA`
